headline: Equifax Canada collaborating to help protect Canadians against scams
summary: – Equifax Canada joins forces with more than 40 other leading businesses and government agencies –TORONTO, Nov. 21, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Equifax Canada has joined the Canadian Anti-Scam Coalition to provide its industry leadership and expertise to help fight financial crime. Canadians lost an estimated $645M* to fraud last year — yet experts estimate that could represent as little as 5-10 per cent of the actual total as many victims do not report fraud.
